pages.text: The Tinker's Workbench is a block that can charge, fill, and apply augments to tools and blocks. Steps for augmenting are on the next page.

pages.title: How to Augment
pages.text: $(li)Put augmentable item or block in the workbench$(li)Set workbench to augment mode$(li)Put augments in the item slot$(li)Set workbench to recharge/refill mode$(li)Remove item from workbench$(li)Profit
